overview: Marion, a young working professional, recounts his tragic memories with his late partner, Davis. The first is the supposed peaceful breakfast of the two that quickly turns into a heated exchange of hurtful words. The second starts as a happy birthday celebration of Marion but escalates into a tense dinner full of jealousy and hatred between the two. The third leads to Marion's admittance to having an HIV, ending with Davis breaking down in front of him.
title: In Memoriam
